First, ensure your GCash account is [Fully Verified](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account#h_01FPYEDSZ597DXA7JF5NWD6PBC) and that you have a BPI savings/checking account.

Linking and cashing in with your BPI or UnionBank account qualifies you for a potential i **ncrease in your GCash wallet and transaction limit to PHP500,000.**

### **How to link your BPI account to GCash:**

1. Tap **Cash In**
2. Select **Local Banks > BPI > Enroll Now**
3. Log in using your Online Banking User ID and Password
4. Enter the 6-digit **OTP** sent to your mobile number

Youâ€™ll see a confirmation page once the linking is successful.
